name: fetch_documentation
description: Retrieves the full FCSpec documentation for a specific tool. The documentation includes the tool's name, description, and parameters, with the parameters structured according to the JSON Schema specification.

service_name.description: The name of the service that contains the specified tool.

tool_name.description: The name of the tool for which to fetch documentation. This tool must exist within the context of the specified `service_name`.

name: list_services
description: Retrieves a list of all available services in the project.

name: list_tools
description: Lists all tool names available for a specific service.

service_name.description: The name of an existing service for which to list available tools.
